'''Radiant Spincrystal 93''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]].<!--to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].-->

It is located on a platform inside the ruins that are located at [[The Sands of Three Canals]].
